special_text:
If one or more counters would be put on another permanent, you may instead put that many loyalty counters on Sesilius.
[+2]: Each opponent loses 3 life unless they sacrifice a nonland permanent or discard a card. Repeat this process once.
[-X]: Exile target nonland permanent with mana value less than or equal to twice X.
[-10]: Draw four cards. Each opponent loses life equal to the number of cards in your hand.
